record.field: The Property "%(property)s" has invalid formula "%(expression)s with invalid: "%(invalid)s"

"%(name)s" can not create a product supplier price that quantity less than 0 from the quote "%(quote)s": Product: %(product)s Price Qty: %(price_qty)s Quote Qty: %(quote_quantity)s Qty: %(qty)s Bom Input Qty: %(bom_input_quantity)s
Formula: ((quote quantity / qty) * bom input quantity)
